participant_1.background:
I'm a single man who enjoys driving my SUV and eating jello.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger.
my favorite drink is pepsi.
i am allergic to shellfish and cats.
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy cooking up a storm on the weekends and running to clear my head.
i lost my arm in a car accident.
I am a caring and giving person who uses my talents to help others.
i work as a librarian.
I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks. Just got back from a long day at work.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What do you do for work?
I'm a librarian.
Oh, that sounds like a really cool job! I love reading.
It is! I get to read all day long.
That's awesome! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, I have so many favorites. But I'm really into fantasy novels right now.
Me too! I love the Lord of the Rings series.
Me too! That's one of my all-time favorites.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, run, and play video games.
Oh, I love to cook too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making mashed potatoes. My mom used to make them for me all the time when I was a kid.
Mashed potatoes are the best! I always add a little bit of garlic and sour cream to mine.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try that next time.
You should! It's really good.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Yeah, it does! We should hang out sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! I'll give you my number
